abstract: The deal is a classic duopoly case study: if AT&T and T-Mobile combine, it will set up a match like Coca-Cola vs. Pepsi, with AT&T pitted against Verizon. But getting antitrust approval may be difficult.
snippet: The deal is a classic duopoly case study: if AT&T and T-Mobile combine, it will set up a match like Coca-Cola vs. Pepsi, with AT&T pitted against Verizon. But getting antitrust approval may be difficult.
lead_paragraph: “We have never seen a deal with more regulatory risk be attempted in the U.S.”

headline.main: AT&T’s Full Cost for Getting T-Mobile
